4314340.name: The Reflection
4314340.description:
The Reflection is a ritual-based co-op horror game focused on tension, teamwork, and survival. Trapped inside a cursed mansion, players must investigate supernatural events, identify the correct rituals, and exorcise a dangerous entity before it consumes them.

The entity reacts to sound, movement, and mistakes. Staying quiet, coordinating actions, and thinking quickly are essential. One wrong step can doom the entire group.

  • 1–4 player online co-op

  • Ritual-based exorcism gameplay

  • Stealth-focused survival mechanics

  • Intelligent entity that adapts to player behavior

  • High tension, low forgiveness

Escape is possible — but never guaranteed.

Gameplay

Gameplay in The Reflection revolves around investigation, coordination, and survival under constant pressure. Players explore to gather clues, identify the correct rituals, and perform them while being actively hunted.

The entity adapts to player behavior — noise, panic, and poor coordination make it more aggressive. Staying hidden, moving carefully, and communicating quietly is critical. Mistakes stack quickly, and one wrong move can doom the entire team.

Each session demands cooperation. Players must divide tasks, watch each other’s backs, and react fast when things inevitably go wrong.
